review: Great for on the go...toss it in my backpack and watch what I want when I want.
author: Marcus Ruffin

review: Love love love the Fire TV Stick! We rarely watch cable anymore and always some new to watch! We also enjoy the games and apps! The one and only downside is that the remote is so small, we losee it quite often. But having the phone app I'd an awesome and convenient backup!
author: Kelly Gibson

review: Works great in my opinion.  No complaints.
author: kc1koolcat

review: Love it most of the time, but this is our second Firestick and at times it is hard to turn on and sometimes streaming stutters even when internet is strong. Not sure what the issue is...and I do miss having a live local news feed.
author: Bobbette Gantz

review: Exceeded my expectations, which were pretty high. Amazing little device!
author: Daniel L Allen

review: This works perfectly. So small it hangs behind the tv and we can't even see it.  Have had no issues. Streams all content great, and love the screensaver photos!
